UserQuery.name: SinkAzureSynapseAnalyticsTable3
UserQuery.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Dato as timestamp,
		NewPositive as integer,
		PosPct as double
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		NewPositive,
		PosPct,
		Dato = Date
	)) ~> SinkAzureSynapseAnalyticsTable3
